Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute at 35th/King Drive
ShortDescription: #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 35th, Indiana, 33rd, King Drive, and 35th, due to police activity near 35th/King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 35th, Indiana, 33rd, King Drive, and 35th, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near 35th/King Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute near 35th/King Drive
ShortDescription: #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near 35th/King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near 35th/King Drive.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, 33rd, King Drive and 5th, then resume their normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via 35th, King Drive, 33rd and Indiana, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
